subject: Football (College)
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
College Athletics
Football
Perjury
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for two officials charged with perjury appeared eager to question the credibility of one witness, the assistant coach Mike McQueary, who said he saw Jerry Sandusky rape a young boy on Penn State property.
snippet: Lawyers for two officials charged with perjury appeared eager to question the credibility of one witness, the assistant coach Mike McQueary, who said he saw Jerry Sandusky rape a young boy on Penn State property.
